extension.description: This plugin for AltaUserPoints shows current userpoints with this syntax ' |{AUP::SHOWPOINTS}| '. You can use this inside a Joomla article or anywhere where content plugins are supported. Also in a custom module if you enable the 'Prepare content' option of the module.
